text: Whenever the Mayor finds that any person has engaged in, or is about to engage in, the unlawful practice of veterinary medicine or any act which constitutes or will constitute a violation of any provision of this subchapter, the Mayor may make application to the Superior Court of the District of Columbia for an order enjoining such unlawful practice or act and upon a showing by the Mayor that the person has engaged in or is about to engage in any unlawful practice or act, an injunction, restraining order, or other orders as may be appropriate shall be granted by the Court without bond.
